name: Peanut Butter Zucchini Mousse
ingredients: 2 cups raw zucchini, peeled and chopped
3-4 tbsp peanut butter (or any nut butter)
Optional: chocolate chips or crushed peanuts for topping
instructions: Peel and chop zucchini into chunks
Add all ingredients to a blender (zucchini, peanut butter, maple syrup, vanilla, salt)
Blend on high until completely smooth and creamy (2-3 minutes)
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed
Pour mixture into small cups or bowls
Refrigerate overnight (or at least 4 hours) to thicken
Optional: top with chocolate chips or crushed peanuts before serving
